en.calendar.description: This is your vehicle calendar. Choose between your cars using the drop down menu at the top of the page. Use this page to control days that your cars are available or unavailable to avoid rejecting rentals and lowering your acceptance rating. You can also add additional pricing to certain dates - for example holidays or occasions that you require higher rates for your car.

en.owner_information.title: List on Fleet
en.owner_information.subtitle: Earn money as a Fleet owner
en.owner_information.point_2: Keep 95% of the fee you set
en.owner_information.point_4: Add your car in less than 20 minutes
en.owner_information.card_1_text: Fleet is the easy and safe way to earn money with your car as and when you want. For every car - whether it's fun, affordable, or exotic - we'll help you find a driver!
en.owner_information.card_2_text: Owners get final say on any request. Set your own rules and price, mark availability on the calendar, and meet the driver face-to-face.
en.owner_information.card_3_text: You’re covered: every rental is fully insured by AXA with 24-hour breakdown assistance. Peer-review and driver vetting ensure a quality community and peace of mind for your car.
en.owner_information.faq_1_title: How much can I earn on Fleet?
en.owner_information.faq_1_text:
Once your car is listed on the app, it’s visible to all of our approved drivers - the rest is up to you! Our most successful owners pull in €1,000-per-month, but just two days a week can see you earn €3,000-per-year - helping you pay down running costs and more.

Pro-tip: top owners set a low initial rate to attract feedback and promote their cars through social media and word of mouth. Ensure you set your calendar & respond promptly to ensure maximium requests.
en.owner_information.faq_2_text: Insurance is applied paperlessly and automatically through the Fleet app. When a booking is checked-in, AXA issue a special insurance policy for the driver, superseding your own personal insurance. Our policy is of the highest quality: protecting your car with comprehensive and 24-hour breakdown assistance while renters drive it.
en.owner_information.faq_3_title: Is my car in good hands?
en.owner_information.faq_3_text:
We take a number of steps to ensure safety & best-behaviour from renters.

  1. Both driver & owner carry out vehicle surveys using the app before and after rentals.
  2. No driver can request your car until they’ve been vetted and approved by us.
  3. Peer review! When you receive a request, you see the driver and their feedback history. We give you final say over accepting any rental, and encourage you to review every renter.
en.owner_information.faq_4_text: Once a booking is confirmed, the driver pays the full rental fee. We pay your earnings directly into your account within 5-7 business days of rental completion.
en.owner_information.faq_5_title: What kinds of cars are accepted?
en.owner_information.faq_5_text: Currently, Fleet accepts standard cars (maximum 5-seats) no older than 13 years. Click here for a full list of requirements. Note: if your vehicle is not eligible, get in touch! We are adding more vehicle types all the time, and we’re eager to find out what’s most in demand.
en.owner_information.help_guide: View our full Owner Help Guide to find out more
en.owner_information.available_on: Available to download on Android & iOS
en.owner_information.app_point_1: Carry out vehicle survey using our sleek Android & iOS apps
en.owner_information.app_point_2: Keep in touch with driver through in-app Messages
en.renter_information.title: Drive on Fleet
en.renter_information.subtitle: Choose your own adventure
en.renter_information.prompt_2: Hire from thousands of local owners
en.renter_information.point_4: Drive from as little as €10 per day
en.renter_information.point_5: No queues - just a smile and a handshake
en.renter_information.card_1_text: Fun cars for hire you won’t find anywhere else. From extra horsepower to electric or affordable, Fleet has countless models and specs for weddings, business trips, or just getting you from A to Z.
en.renter_information.card_2_text: Rent premium cars up to 20% cheaper than standard car hire, keep money in your community, and help the environment by sharing from a local owner. Fleet can even save you a trip with car delivery from select owners.
en.renter_information.card_3_text: Our peer-review system ensures happy drivers and friendly hosts. Exchange keys, get driving tips, and survey the car using the app. On-demand insurance and 24-hour breakdown from AXA keep you safe during the rental.
en.renter_information.faq_cta: View our full Renter Help Guide to find out more.
en.renter_information.faq_1_text: Fleet is available to drivers aged 25 or older who hold a full EU licence - with more licence types on the way. See our full driver eligibility requirements for more details.
en.renter_information.faq_2_title: How does car rental on Fleet work?
en.renter_information.faq_2_text:
Find your car, choose your dates, and select on-demand collection or add a message if needed.

Once you submit a booking, the owner will respond within 24 hours (usually, less than two!) to confirm or reject your request.

Then you simply meet up, give the car a quick check, exchange the keys, and off you go!
en.renter_information.faq_3_text:
No insurance deposit needed! Unlike traditional car rental, Fleet, does not charge your card an excess up front - you only pay the rental fee.

Fleet owners set their own daily rate on each car, with insurance and a service fee added at confirmation. (You can view this full price before a booking request is sent).
en.renter_information.faq_4_title: I can’t find a car in my area
en.renter_information.faq_4_text: Get in touch! Fleet now has owners in every county. Sometimes cars may not appear on the map during off-peak periods: if so, contact Fleet support and we’ll see if there are any owners in your area with inactive listings.
en.renter_information.faq_5_text:
Each Fleet rental is covered by comprehensive insurance from AXA Ireland. Fleet’s insurance is on-demand, meaning your policy is instantly created when you collect the car & sign off using the app.

This policy carries an excess of €500 - the amount the driver will pay in the event of a claim resulting from vehicle damage.

Note that drivers who have made a claim in the previous five years or who hold driving convictions are not eligible to use Fleet.

You can read more about Fleet’s insurance here.

en.renter_information.app_point_1: Hundreds of cars in your pocket
en.renter_information.app_point_2: Keep in touch with owner through in-app Messages
